summary: THE MINIVANS ENGINE AND ALL ELECTRONICS WILL SHUT OFF WHILE IN DRIVE, WE LOSE POWER STEERING AND ARE PROMPTED TO SHIFT TO PARK AND RESTART, IT'S HAPPENED 3 TIMES SO FAR ONCE DRIVING 45MPH ON A CITY STREET, ONCE AT A RED LIGHT IN DRIVE ON A LARGER HIGHWAY AND ONCE IN PARK IN A PARKING GARAGE.. ....UPDATED 11/03/17 *BF  UPDATED11/09/2017*JS
